library(tidyverse)
#the data

#The "cars" data set references the speed and stopping distances of cars in the 1920s

*Source: "{datasets}"*

#Cars Scatterplot

data(cars)

cars%>%

  ggplot()+
  geom_point(aes(x=dist,y=speed))+
  theme_minimal()+
  labs(title="Speed vs Stopping Distance",
  x="Stopping Distance (ft)",
  y="Speed (MPH)")
